title: Riot Please
body: Well its been more than a week since I submitted 3 requests for an email change. Can someone please update me on the status?

replies.body:
We've had a lot of tickets submitted lately, so response times are going to be a bit longer than normal.

Sit tight and an account specialist will be with you soon. Let me know if you have any questions.
Could the problem be that the support tickets aren't linked with my account? I cannot check their current status but, all the information should be in the support tickets.

I think overall this is just related to wait times and the fact that you've submitted multiple requests for the same issue, which can actually cause confusion and/or lengthen the time it takes to get back to you. 

As I said before, though, we won't leave you out to dry and will get back to you as soon as a specialist is available to.
